title: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur: Regal Nakshi Haaram
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణము) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features Oval-cut Emeralds of exceptional clarity and brilliant-cut Diamonds (వజ్రాలు). Crafted with meticulous attention to detail using time-honored techniques.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a traditional Nakshi (నక్షి) design with floral and geometric motifs. The central pendant features an elaborate sunburst design adorned with Emeralds and Diamonds, creating a mesmerizing focal point. The intricate openwork gold framework adds depth and dimension to the piece. Delicate gold bead drops (గుండ్లు) add a touch of playful elegance.
colors: and Yellow Gold. The rich green of the Emeralds perfectly complements the warm yellow of the gold
creating a classic and luxurious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (వివాహము)
and other significant celebrations. Also ideal for adding a touch of regal elegance to modern formal events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship and artistry. The use of high-quality Emeralds and Diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The intricate Nakshi work and Hyderabadi Polish showcase the skill of our master artisans. Owning this piece is not just about wearing jewelry; it's about owning a piece of cultural heritage and making a statement of unparalleled elegance.
